summary: This is an email exchange between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a call to preview views on the Maxwell/Epstein documents. It indicates internal coordination within the prosecution team ahead of a meeting.

persons.name: Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The recipient of the email, identified by their title, who is being asked to provide views on the Maxwell/Epstein documents ahead of a team meeting.

events.title: Scheduling of call on Maxwell/Epstein documents
events.description: An email exchange to schedule a call between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office to preview views on the Maxwell/Epstein documents, indicating ongoing case preparation.
personsInvolved: Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Internal communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Maxwell/Epstein case.
A call with the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) concerning Maxwell/Epstein documents was scheduled for July 28, 2020, at 4:00 PM.
The email indicates coordination to gather the views of the Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney before a team meeting the following day.
